name: Ashura the Hedgehog
description:
Dr. Robotnik builds machine that creates Sonics new enemy..... or a friend? Join Ashura the Hedgehog on his jorney to stop Eggman from his evil plan and save Mobius once again!

*PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING!*

One part of this game contains rapidly changing colors and images which can cause epilepsy in some people. To be exact Emerald Chamber Zone which takes place after Egg Station Zone so if you're sensitive to things like that stop playing after Act 2 of this Zone.

-Controlls-

Move - Arrows

Jump - Space

Skip - Space
